mapper.select: select * from flight where status=#{status} and source = #{source};
mapper.insert: insert into flight(plane_id, source, target, starttime, preendtime, status, economy_class, business_class, first_class, oprice) values (#{planeId}, #{source}, #{target}, #{starttime}, #{preendtime}, #{status}, #{economyClass}, #{businessClass}, #{firstClass}, #{oprice});
mapper.update: update flight set status = #{status} where flight_id = #{flightId}
